caption: The image features a rectangular sign, predominantly in white with text in red. The sign reads "UNDER FRIENDLY OWNER MGT. REASONABLE RATES OPEN ALL YEAR" in all-caps, bold red font. The layout of the text is organized into four lines centered on the sign, and there are two red starsâ€”one at the top and another at the bottom of the text. title: Sign on one of the many retirement hotels that crowd the beach area of South Beach.
